item.title: Mail alerts module - BO Header Buttons
item.description: Mail alerts module - BO Header Buttons Details Component : ps_emailalerts Status : Automated Automated on : 9.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-4147 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/modules/ps_emailalerts/02_configuration/01_boHeaderButtons.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Modules > Module manager and search ps_emailalerts The module page list should be displayed and Mail alerts module should be displayed on the list Click on “Configure” button at the right of the module * The “Configure” page is displayed
